channel.title: Over The Fire Cooking by Derek Wolf
channel.description:
If anyone says that Netflix cannot change your life, then they are lying. I first fell in love with fire cooking on my couch watching TV while procrastinating school work in college. While scrolling through the endless list of shows, I found a documentary following a South American chef and his adventures cooking with fire. It was love at first sight. I had to try it myself. When my wife and I got a fire pit as a wedding present, we decided to put it to good use. The first meal we cooked was a nice skirt steak with some homemade chimichurri sauce. It must have been beginners luck because it tasted delicious. From that moment on, I decided that if I was grilling, then I was grilling over a fire.
What started as a passion for fire cooking and photography has found me doing Youtube! We post recipes three times a week with tons more on our Facebook, Instagram and blog! Come follow along!

image.title: Over The Fire Cooking by Derek Wolf
